trans-unit.source: Represents a condition that compares the value of an activity member to a specified value by using a specified comparison operator.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 비교 연산자를 사용하여 활동 멤버의 값을 지정된 값과 비교하는 조건을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to constrain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> or an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class.
If you use the default constructor, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자를 사용하는 경우 명시적으로 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>를 설정해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must also set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
The dot delineated name of an activity member.
The value to be compared
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class by specifying an activity member and a value for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 활동 멤버 및 비교할 값을 지정하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> is set to `member`, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is set to `value`.
The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
<paramref name="member" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" />이 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the activity member that is to be compared with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value" />와 비교할 활동 멤버의 이름을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of the activity member

You can specify an activity property or field, a member of an activity property or field, or a single element of an activity property or field (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 활동 속성이나 필드, 활동 속성이나 필드의 멤버 또는 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 인터페이스를 구현하는 활동 속성이나 필드(또는 그 멤버)의 단일 요소를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a single element of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 컬렉션의 단일 요소를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>의 기본 생성자를 사용하는 경우 명시적으로 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>를 설정해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified activity member is compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>를 적용하여 지정된 활동 멤버의 값이 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>와 비교됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates accessing the Member property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 Member 속성에 액세스하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는 Tracking Profile Designer SDK 샘플에 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 조건이 확인되었으며 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" />가 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> is incorrectly formed.
The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> does not refer to a valid activity member.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 확인되었으며 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" />가 올바른 활동 멤버를 참조하지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the operator that is used in the comparison.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator" /> values.
The default is <see langword="Equals" />.
Currently only supports `Equals` and `NotEquals`.
The value that is to be compared with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" />.
The value used in the comparison.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is compared to the value of
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>의 기본 생성자를 사용하는 경우 명시적으로 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>를 설정해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates accessing the Value property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 Value 속성에 액세스하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는 Tracking Profile Designer SDK 샘플에 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
